title: Language filter still on after its been disabled
body: I turned off the language filter off on the legacy and the new client and it still censors everything

replies.body:
I've seen a few reports of the toggle not working for the language filter, but you can do it manually as a temporary work around. 

- Close League of Legends
- Go to C:\Riot Games\League of Legends\RADS\projects\lol_air_client\releases\(lat est version)\deploy\preferences
- Open up the shared(summoner name).PROPERTIES file up with Notepad
- It should say:
[Chat]
EnableChatFilter=1
- Just change the 1 to a 0. Hit Ctrl+S to save it.

Let me know if this helps!
Yes its finally off now ty :)

I have noticed it's inverted for me form the ingame chat command.
If it says "Chat filter is now disabled" it actually enables it and vice versa.
